document_data.mainbody:
unnar Thrune was a Tymoran patriarch of the Ladys Hall in Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Gunnar was exceptionally boisterous, hearty, happy, and loud.
Thrune was most often found motivating gamblers and bettors either verbally or via a slap on the black. During crises, he was known to encourage bets on such events.
Thrune was originally from the remote island known as Gundarlun. In 1482 DR, Gunnar led the other priests of the Tymoran temple known as the Ladys Hall.
